export const formatDateWithSuffix=dateStr=>{const date=new Date(dateStr);const day=date.getDate();const getDaySuffix=d=>{if(d>3&&d<21)return'th';switch(d%10){case 1:return'st';case 2:return'nd';case 3:return'rd';default:return'th';}};const dayWithSuffix="".concat(day).concat(getDaySuffix(day));const month=date.toLocaleString('en-GB',{month:'long'});const year=date.getFullYear();return"".concat(dayWithSuffix," ").concat(month,", ").concat(year);};export const getDaysToGo=dateStr=>{const matchDate=new Date(dateStr);const today=new Date();// Reset time to 00:00:00 to calculate full days difference
matchDate.setHours(0,0,0,0);today.setHours(0,0,0,0);const diffTime=matchDate.getTime()-today.getTime();const diffDays=Math.ceil(diffTime/(1000*60*60*24));if(diffDays<0)return'Match Ended';if(diffDays===0)return'Today';if(diffDays===1)return'1 day to go';return"".concat(diffDays," days to go");};
